articles.description: Iincreased adoption of the work from home culture post the pandemic led IT companies to postpone their decision to lease office spaces, especially after a severe second wave of Covid hit the country in March 2021.
articles.content: The information technology (IT) sector, which was once a key driver of demand for office spaces, continues to see a decline in its share in leasing transactions. According to the latest data by prope… [+1915 chars]

articles.author: Ratna Bhushan
articles.title: Essentials flying off ecomm shelves, online sales see 15% jump in a week - Economic Times
articles.description: Limited operating hours at stores and consumers staying indoors following the surge in cases has also contributed to higher online sales, executives said.
articles.content: Sales of daily essentials including packaged foods, soaps and hygiene products have surged on ecommerce platforms in the past seven days as states have imposed several curbs to check Covid-19 infecti… [+4451 chars]
